```{python}
# %load_ext rpy2.ipython
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "Letter": ["a", "a", "a", "b", "b", "b", "c", "c", "c"],
        "X": [4, 3, 5, 2, 1, 7, 7, 5, 9],
        "Y": [0, 4, 3, 6, 7, 10, 11, 9, 13],
        "Z": [1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3],
    }
)
```

```{r magic_args="-i df"}
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(data = df) + geom_point(aes(x = X, y = Y, color = Letter, size = Z))
```
